DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the effect of medicines for type 2 diabetes and lipids control. This study will require about 6 office visits for lab tests and examinations. All study related medicines and medical examinations will be provided at no cost to the subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: A clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus. Women must not be pregnant or breastfeeding during the study and 30 days after the study. Must sign an informed consent form at the study clinic. Exclusion criteria: Severe chronic diseases that would prevent from participating and completing the study by investigator's judgement. Use of an investigational drug within 30 days or 5 half lives before first dose of study medication. Insulin use for > 1 week in past 3 months.
